name: Caldra
appearance: Lanternwoman with oil-burnished coat, a pocket full of wick-stubs, and a smile brighter than the lamps she tends.
character: Mercurial broker of light and rumor, believes the city survives on the right shadows in the right places.
talents: remembers complex codebooks after one pass
can vanish in a crowd of three
dreams: Unseat the Wardens from beacon monopoly
Build an independent rescue flotilla funded by discreet fees
secrets: Double-coded a signal to sink a corsair and a rival Lantern crew in one stroke
Hides a cache of ambered documents stolen from the Vaults
